original_text: Now as the church submits to Christ, so also wives should submit in everything to their husbands.
korean_text: 그러므로 교회가 그리스도에게 하듯 아내들도 범사에 자기 남편에게 복종할지니라

sentences.original_text: Now as the church submits to Christ
so also wives should submit in everything to their husbands.
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 같이 아내들도 모든 일에 자기 남편에게 복종해야 합니다.
